name: Pause.Go
description:
This was made for the Kenney Jam event. Sorry for the zip, I couldn't get the HTML5 export to work from Unity.

Left, Right: Move
Up: Jump
Space: Menu/Pause
R: Restart Level

PS - This is best enjoyed in windowed-mode.

Enjoy!

Special thanks for Juhani Junkala for the tunes via OpenGameArt: https://juhanijunkala.com/
